content.html: AWS Lambdas are now configurable up to: 10GB deployment size 10GB RAM (6vCPU) 10GB /tmp 15 minute runtime So your most expensive per-invocation lambda cost ends up: ~$0.13 On Fargate, nonspot, (4vCPU) that same task: ~$0.07 Worth it? Totally depends on the workload.
content.value:
AWS Lambdas are now configurable up to:
10GB deployment size
10GB RAM (6vCPU)
10GB  /tmp
15 minute runtime

So your most expensive per-invocation lambda cost ends up: ~$0.13 

On Fargate, nonspot, (4vCPU) that same task:
~$0.07

Worth it? Totally depends on the workload.
